Languages.string: telepathy 60 ft. (works only with creatures that understand Abyssal)

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The dretch makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Claws
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (2d4) slashing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Fetid Cloud (1/Day)
MonsterTrait.Text: A 10-foot radius of disgusting green gas extends out from the dretch. The gas spreads around corners, and its area is lightly obscured. It lasts for 1 minute or until a strong wind disperses it. Any creature that starts its turn in that area must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. While poisoned in this way, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both, and canâ€™t take reactions.
